pageContext.claim: “I said, “Look, we give you hundreds of millions of dollars, Guatemala. And you're going to stop those people from coming.””
pageContext.analysis: The U.S. has given substantial foreign aid to Central America over the last several years, but it has declined dramatically since Trump took office. All three countries were only allocated $88 million dollars in aid in 2018, down from a combined total of $499 million in 2016.
